General.Name: Esta Multi Usaha PT
General.Description: PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk owns and operates a hotel under the Hotel 88 name in Indonesia. The company's Hotel 88 operates approximately 70 rooms located in Bekasi City. It also engages in the leasing and rental activities, including vehicles comprising passenger cars, trucks, trailers, and other vehicles, as well as property leasing activities. The company was formerly known as PT Esta Asri Propertindo and changed its name to PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk in September 2019. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in South Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Esta Utama Corpora.
General.Address: Wisma D'Esta Commercial Complex, South Tangerang, Indonesia, 15318
